name: Tableau Langchain
description: Tableau tools for Agentic use cases with Langgraph

DEBUG.description: Controls how much logging occurs during Agent operations can be 1 or 0

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API Key required for using ChatGPT

AGENT_MODEL.description: LLM model used by the Agent such as (gpt-4o-mini)

RETRIEVER_MODEL.description: Embedding model used by Retriever Tools such as (text-embedding-3-small)

LANGCHAIN_TRACING_V2.description: Boolean either true or false for agent tracing on Langsmith

LANGCHAIN_ENDPOINT.description: Service for hosting agent traces for analysis (Langsmith)

LANGCHAIN_API_KEY.description: Langchain API Key for using Langsmith

LANGCHAIN_PROJECT.description: Project containing agent traces on Langsmith

TAVILY_API_KEY.description: API Key for Web Search via the Tavily service

PINECONE_API_KEY.description: API Key for managing serverless vector databases on Pinecone

PINECONE_ENVIRONMENT.description: The cloud environment hosting the Pinecone serverless vector databases

TABLEAU_DOMAIN.description: Hostname for your Tableau Cloud environment

TABLEAU_API.description: Version of the Tableau REST API used for some Agent operations

TABLEAU_JWT_CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID from an enabled Tableau Connected App used for JWT authentication

TABLEAU_JWT_SECRET_ID.description: Secret ID from an enabled Tableau Connected App used for JWT authentication

TABLEAU_JWT_SECRET.description: Secret from an enabled Tableau Connected App used for JWT authentication

TABLEAU_USER.description: A valid Tableau user for access to the analytics environment

TABLEAU_MCP_URL.description: Base URL of the Tableau MCP HTTP server (no trailing slash required)
